You can not vote for the hard fork update since your mining status is deactivated.

The mining penalties might be charged if the fork is activated by the
          network majority.
Please be aware that both mining and val: Please be aware that both mining and validation rewards will go to the pool’s owner address if you delegate your mining status. Your address will get only the part of rewards that goes to your stake. Your identity could be terminated by the pool owner and you can lose your stake.
Disabling delegation could be done at th: Disabling delegation could be done at the next epoch only.
Submit the form to start mining. Your no: Submit the form to start mining. Your node has to be online unless you deactivate your status. Otherwise penalties might be charged after being offline more than 1 hour.
You can not vote for the hard fork updat:
You can not vote for the hard fork update since your mining status is deactivated.
                Please activate your mining status to vote or update the node.
Please read the rules carefully. You can: Please read the rules carefully. You can lose all your validation rewards if any of your flips is reported.
Import is not available for the external: Import is not available for the external node
The flip is to be reported: The flip is to be reported
You'll get rewards for reported flips if: You'll get rewards for reported flips if these flip are also reported by other participants (more than 50% of qualification committee).
Oracles who vote against the majority ar: Oracles who vote against the majority are penalized. Voting will be started in a future date.
Oracles can vote for any option. Rewards: Oracles can vote for any option. Rewards will be paid to everyone regardless of the outcome of the vote.
51% consensus is required to make a desi: 51% consensus is required to make a desision
Internal node is not available, try agai: Internal node is not available, try again in a few seconds
Please report the flip in the following: Please report the flip in the following cases:
You can not find a keyword in the story: You can not find a keyword in the story
You'll get rewards for reported flips if: You'll get rewards for reported flips if this flip are also reported by other participants.
You'll get a reward if the flip is also: You'll get a reward if the flip is also reported by other participants (more than 50% of the qualification committee is required).
One of the keywords is not clearly visib: One of the keywords is not clearly visible in the story
There are numbers or letters indicating: There are numbers or letters indicating the order
There are labels indicating the right or: There are labels indicating the right order
Some of the Idena users can not not read: Some of the Idena users can not not read the text in your local language
There is text that is necessary to read: There is text that is necessary to read to solve the flip
Please re-sync the node if you want to h: Please re-sync the node if you want to have an up-to-date transaction history for the new address. It will take some time to re-sync.
You need to create at least 3 flips per:
You need to create at least 3 flips per epoch to participate
                    in the next validation ceremony. Follow step-by-step
                    instructions.
You'll get rewarded for every successful: You'll get rewarded for every successfully qualified flip.
